thread.title: WTF | Watch: So a full on trad session broke out on an Aer Lingus flight over the weekend
thread.title_full: WTF | Watch: So a full on trad session broke out on an Aer Lingus flight over the weekend - entertainment.ie

author: Fiona Flynn
title: WTF | Watch: So a full on trad session broke out on an Aer Lingus flight over the weekend
text:
How come stuff like this doesn't happen on flights we're on? We could all do with a bit of a bop and dee-diddly-eye on the odd flight or two.
Passengers travelling on Aer Lingus over the weekend however did find themselves treated to a bit of a trad session, with even the air hostess getting involved for a bit of a twirl.
The hostess in questioned, Orla O'Brien, posted the video to her Facebook page yesterday and is fast becoming quite the viral hit.
We're pretty sure Aer Lingus should make Orla and the lads part of all of their inflight entertainment from now on.
Check them out;
 Inflight entertainment at its best!
Posted by Orla O' Brien on Tuesday, 13 October 2015 MORE: Ryanair are thinking about letting you bring your dogs on board
MORE: I Got Spray-Tanned Today And It Was Awful
MORE: Watch: Someone made a dance music video out of a Ryanair flight safety card & it's incredible
